reviews.author: Halfkin Rainbolt
reviews.review: I moved in,  early 2022, shortly after the business was bought by a new company. I have had a wonderful experience with the management and no problems to speak of. The maintenance is good, prompt and friendly. I recommend this to others.

reviews.author: Lynda Galbraith
reviews.review: We delivered to a nice lady here. The one bedroom was nice size. Nice inside. Seems quiet

reviews.author: Mesake Tudrau
reviews.review: It's  an old apartment with high rent. I suppose to get a refund back but it seems like they don't bother. A stubborn officer with not very friendly approach in the ofgice.

reviews.author: Andrew Davis
reviews.review: Recently tenents have been complaining about high rent increassess at Forest park apartments.  It appears to me this is primarily the result of the high inflation, nationally.  SUHRCO is the new company managing Forest Park apartments.  To

reviews.author: Tasha Beckham
reviews.review: We needed a new washer and they brought over a used dirty one and it started spitting all this dirty and stuff but now my kids blankets smell so bad and have stuff all over it smh

reviews.author: make America great again
reviews.review: They fail to tell you that a methadone clinic is across the street.
